name: Easy Digital Downloads – Software Licensing – Renew All
author: Pippin Williamson

sections.description:
This is a simple add-on for Easy Digital Downloads – Software Licensing. It does not function without it.

Once activated, a “Renew” button with a select drop down will be added to the top of the [edd_license_keys] shortcode. This will allow customers to easily renew all of their license keys by adding all keys to the cart with a single click. Customers can renew all expired keys, all keys expiring within 30 days, or all keys, regardless of the expiration date.
sections.installation:
1. Purchase and install Easy Digital Downloads – Software Licensing. 3.4 or later is required.
  2. Add [edd_license_keys] to a page.
  3. Renew all option will be shown at the top of the page with [edd_license_keys]
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 May 4, 2016

  • Only show “All Expired Keys” if the customer has expired keys

1.0.1 November 8, 2015

  • Added a class of “button” to the submit button

1.0

  • First release

short_description: Provides an option for customers to easily renew all license keys. Requires Software Licensing for Easy Digital Downloads
